entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
